Issued at 12.00 noon on 12 August 2024
Atmospheric conditions are favorable for development of evening thundershowers in the
island during the next few days.

howers or thundershowers will occur at most places on the island during the evening or night.

  few  Showers  may  occur  in  Kalutara,  Galle,  Matara  and  Rathnapura  districts  during  the

Southern, North-western and North-central provinces.
